mapper.insert: INSERT INTO teachers (teacherid, name, gender, title, fieldofstudy, contactnumber, departmentid) VALUES (#{teacherId}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{title}, #{fieldOfStudy}, #{contactNumber}, #{departmentId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM teachers WHERE teacherid LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTerm}, '%') OR name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTerm}, '%') LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM teachers WHERE teacherid LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTerm}, '%') OR name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTerm}, '%')

SELECT T.TEACHERID, T.NAME, T.GENDER, T.TITLE, T.FIELDOFSTUDY, T.CONTACTNUMBER, T.DEPARTMENTID, D.DEPARTMENTNAME, D.ADDRESS, C.CLASSID, C.CLASSNAME FROM "SYSDBA"."TEACHERS" T LEFT JOIN "SYSDBA"."DEPARTMENTS" D ON T.DEPARTMENTID = D.DEPARTMENTID LEFT JOIN "SYSDBA"."CLASSES" C ON T.TEACHERID = C.TEACHERID WHERE T.TEACHERID = #{teacherId};
